page.title: 18RECREATION_ LEISURE TRAVEL
page.content: {BROWNIE BANNER } We made a Brownie Banner for the celebration at the Forbury Gardens because we are 75 this year. It all started when Lady Baden-Powell decided to make Brownies but they were called Rosebuds. They enjoyed it except their name so they changed it to Brownies. The year Rosebuds started was 1910. {LEISURE TRAVEL} Travelling by car is favourite because it is so convenient. Buses and trains cannot always get to country roads. Trains are more expensive but are useful to go to London or main cities where it is difficult to park. Buses are more convenient to go into town in because they have special places reserved for them (bus stops) and they can travel along special bus lanes. Cars are not practical for shopping as car parks are expensive.
